help-file.title: SPIRITMASTER
help-file.content:
A Spiritmaster is a multi-class Shaman/Cleric.
Notes on Spiritmaster: Shamans use totems, and memorize spells without spellbooks. Clerics pray, and require no spellbooks or totems. If you start as a Shaman, you will memorize spells, but you will no longer need totems, for ANY of your spells. If you start as a Cleric, you will pray spells, but again, you will not need totems, for ANY of your spells.
